column1: A Mass of Christian Burial will be at 1:00 PM Monday
column3: 2015 at Our Lady Queen of Heaven Catholic Church under the direction of Johnson Funeral Home. Monsignor Charles Dubois will officiate. Interment will follow in Consolata Cemetery. Visitation Sunday will be from 4:00 PM until 8:00 PM with a rosary beginning at 5:00 PM. Visitation Monday will be from 8:00 AM until 12:45 PM in the funeral home.
